msbt.message: So, like, all the stuff around today evolved from all the stuff in here? That's wild!Do you think there are any distant ancestors in here, ?
How do you think all this stuff ended up inside rocks, anyhow? I've always wondered about that
Some of these critters were around when the world was mostly water.Can you imagine what their world must've been like? Besides wet, I mean.

Even as fossils, some these things are scary! I don't even know what I'd do if I saw a living dinosaurWould I run? Would I just stand there? Would I try to make friends with it? Kinda weird to think about!
Did you know the dino fossils come to life at night? Seriously! They roam the island pruning the trees.Bwa ha ha! Yeah, no. That'd be dumb.

I wanna think that if I ever met a real-deal dinosaur, I'd be like, "Tell me of your dino-ways!"When I was little, I was ALL about the dinosaurs. I'd read every dino book I could get my hands on.I always used to wonder if the books got the colors right though. Like, what if they were floral patterned?

It's wacky to think these all used to be alive and running around, acting all scary-like.In a way, it reminds me to try to live in the here and now, y'know? And to also try to act a little less scary-like.
Every fossil in here is tens of millions of years old, and that's STILL pretty young for a fossil!Makes me wonder what kinda stuff from our time is gonna end up fossilized, .

I bet these fossilized critters were all really solid buddies.I mean, I bet they weren't too hard on each other.They seem like they were the sedimental type.But they probably had a lot of backbone!And a stone-cold stare.They were also the real salt of the earth.They really knew how to work that rock-and-bone look too. I can't think of a boulder style!Hang on, hang on! One moreAll of 'em totally rocked!
I never get tired of looking at fossils. I love trying to imagine what these beasties were like, .I really wanna check out the museums on the other islands. Some day!
Time just flies by when I'm staring at fossils. But can you imagine how much time THEY'VE seen?It kinda gets weird when I stare for too long though. I swear I think they're moving sometimes.
Sometimes fossils don't look like much, but they can be super cool when they're rigged up like this.
With such a rad museum, maybe we'll be able to learn some stuff about the fossils here.Plus we'll get to stick 'em on display. That's gonna rock, !
Blathers seriously knows his fossils. I'm learning TONS, !I just can't believe how cool this island is. I mean, it's got its own MUSEUM! That's nuts!
It's so rad that there's a museum here. I can come by whenever and check out all the weird new fossils!
